summary: The Deccal or commonly referred to as "Demons", these creatures are a new species created by Mehrunes Dagon. It combines dremora, elf and human on a single body. They are the harbingers of the apocalypse. Will they be Tamriel's doom... or savior?
descriptionHtml:
The Deccal Race is a standalone lore friendly race.İt is a mashup of orc/dremora/nord.İt has high base stats of conjuration, speech, One-Handed, Destruction, Alteration and illusion.For now it is male only.



Stay tuned there's more to come!
author: efe1804
